name: Perdita
description:
Perdita is an atmospheric story rich first person horror game, with focus on dynamic paranormal events, as well as traditional investigation methods.You are investigating the legend of voodoo priestess Julia Brown and her husband at their old house at Manchac Swamps, Louisiana. the year is 1989. 20 years ago Julia died cursing the whole town, after her death, three hurricanes hit the area. Leaving death and destruction behind.

The game is based upon a urban legend.

Features:

  • Dynamic paranormal event system
  • HUD objective and event system
  • Interact able environment.
  • Light Puzzles.
  • Investigation through clues, notes, newspapers, books etc.
  • Unpredictable gameplay with focus on story and subtle horror.

You can adjust quality settings inside the game through ESC > Options.
You can view / edit controls inside the game through ESC > Controls.
